REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f2137 reute r f BC-BIS-HOLDS-REGULAR-MON 04-13 0052

TEXT.TITLE: CENTRAL BANKERS HOLDS REGULAR BIS MONTHLY MEETING
TEXT.BODY: Leading central bank governors held their routine monthly meeting at the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) here today, monetary sources said. There was no indication of subjects discussed. No statements were planned. Reuter
